title: Home
welcomeText:
# So Buzzworthy, It's Unbelievable!

Buzzard Co. isn't a real company, but it could be. The pattern of capturing and marketing user data described by Kevin Quan’s buzzworthy creation is already happening in different ways, sometimes by small startups, but also by the world’s largest social media companies.
seoDescription: A quickstart for Nuxt & Netlify CMS
